name: Mind The Gap (LD38 version)
description:
Hello everyone!

This is the WebGL variant for my Ludum Dare 38 entry, Mind the Gap. This is the as-is release for the compo; I am currently working on a player friendly version of the game that has a tutorial and fixes a few of the gameplay issues that I have with the game.

For now, please see the Ludum Dare page for instructions on how to play the game. https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/mind-the-gap

Thanks for checking out the game!
